description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help the Cat-professor to fight his way back to our dimension, defeating angry monsters and treacherous bosses using his explosive powers and feline agility.
description.short: Help the Cat-professor to fight his way back to our dimension, defeating angry monsters and treacherous bosses using his explosive powers and feline agility.
